law.catch_line: A person may engage in the business of providing plumbing services if:...

text.section:
A person may engage in the business of providing plumbing services if:
the person is a master plumber or holder of a limited master plumber license; or
the person:
designates a master plumber or holder of a limited master plumber license who actively directs, controls, and is responsible for all plumbing services; and
otherwise provides the plumbing services in accordance with this title.

A person may engage in the business of providing propane gas services if:
the person is the holder of a propane gas fitter certificate; or
the person:
designates a holder of a propane gas fitter certificate who actively directs, controls, and is responsible for all propane gas services; and
otherwise provides the propane gas services in accordance with this title.

A person may engage in the business of providing natural gas services if:
the person is the holder of a master natural gas fitters license; or
the person:
designates a holder of a master natural gas fitters license who actively directs, controls, and is responsible for all natural gas services; and
otherwise provides natural gas services in accordance with this title.
